357380.name: Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie
357380.description: It's ANGRY VIDEO GAME NERD - THE MOVIE! Based on the hit web series, AVGN: The Movie follows the Nerd (James Rolfe), a disgruntled gamer and online celebrity who must overcome his fear of the worst video game of all time in order to save his fans. Hilarity ensues as a simple road trip becomes an extravagant pursuit of the unexpected.
357380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
developers: Angry Video Game Nerd Movie, LLC
